verses.verse: In those days<WH3117> there was no king<WH4428> in Israel:<WH3478> and in those days<WH3117> the tribe<WH7626> of the Danites<WH1839> sought<WH1245> an inheritance<WH5159> to dwell in;<WH3427> for to that day,<WH3117> their inheritance<WH5159> had not fallen<WH5307> to them among<WH8432> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

The children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> sent<WH7971> of their family<WH4940> five<WH2568> men<WH582> from their whole number,<WH7098> men<WH1121> of valor,<WH2428> from Zorah,<WH6881> and from Eshtaol,<WH847> to spy<WH7270> out the land,<WH776> and to search<WH2713> it;<WH559> and they said to them,<WH3212> "Go, explore<WH2713> the land!<WH776>" They came<WH935> to the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim,<WH669> to the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> and lodged there.<WH3885>

When they were by the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> they knew<WH5234> the voice<WH6963> of the young man<WH5288> the Levite;<WH3881> and they turned aside<WH5493> there,<WH559> and said to him,<WH935> "Who brought you here?<WH1988> What do you do in this place?<WH6213> What do you have here?"
He said<WH559> to them,<WH2090> "Thus and thus<WH2090> has Micah<WH4318> dealt<WH6213> with me,<WH7936> and he has hired me,<WH3548> and I am become his priest."
They said<WH559> to him,<WH7592> "Please ask counsel of God,<WH430> that we may know<WH3045> whether our way<WH1870> which we go<WH1980> shall be prosperous.<WH6743>"
The priest<WH3548> said<WH559> to them,<WH3212> "Go in peace.<WH7965> Your way<WH1870> in which you go<WH3212> is before<WH5227> Yahweh.<WH3068>"

Then the five<WH2568> men<WH582> departed,<WH3212> and came<WH935> to Laish,<WH3919> and saw<WH7200> the people<WH5971> who were therein,<WH7130> how they lived<WH3427> in security,<WH983> in the way<WH4941> of the Sidonians,<WH6722> quiet<WH8252> and secure;<WH982> for there was none in the land,<WH776> possessing authority,<WH3423> that might put them to shame<WH3637> in anything,<WH1697> and they were far<WH7350> from the Sidonians,<WH6722> and had no dealings<WH1697> with any man.<WH120>
They came<WH935> to their brothers<WH251> to Zorah<WH6881> and Eshtaol:<WH847> and their brothers<WH251> said to them,<WH559> "What do you say?"

They said,<WH559> "Arise,<WH6965> and let us go up<WH5927> against them;<WH7200> for we have seen the land,<WH776> and behold,<WH3966> it is very good.<WH2896> Do you stand still?<WH2814> Don't<WH6101> be slothful to go<WH3212> and to enter<WH935> in to possess<WH3423> the land.<WH776>

When you go,<WH935> you shall come<WH935> to a secure<WH982> people,<WH5971> and the land<WH776> is large;<WH7342> for God<WH430> has given<WH5414> it into your hand,<WH3027> a place<WH4725> where there is no want<WH4270> of anything<WH1697> that is in the earth.<WH776>"

There set<WH5265> forth from there of the family<WH4940> of the Danites,<WH1839> out of Zorah<WH6881> and out of Eshtaol,<WH847> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> girt<WH2296> with weapons<WH3627> of war.<WH4421>

They went up,<WH5927> and encamped<WH2583> in Kiriath Jearim,<WH7157> in Judah:<WH3063> therefore they called<WH7121> that place<WH4725> Mahaneh Dan,<WH4265> to this day;<WH3117> behold,<WH310> it is behind Kiriath Jearim.<WH7157>
They passed<WH5674> there to the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim,<WH669> and came<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of Micah.<WH4318>

Then the five<WH2568> men<WH582> who went<WH1980> to spy out<WH7270> the country<WH776> of Laish<WH3919> answered,<WH6030> and said<WH559> to their brothers,<WH251> "Do you know<WH3045> that there is<WH3426> in these houses<WH1004> an ephod,<WH646> and teraphim,<WH8655> and an engraved image,<WH6459> and a molten image?<WH4541> Now therefore consider<WH3045> what you have to do.<WH6213>"
They turned<WH5493> aside there,<WH935> and came to the house<WH1004> of the young man<WH5288> the Levite,<WH3881> even to the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> and asked him of his welfare.<WH7592>

The six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> girt<WH2296> with their weapons<WH3627> of war,<WH4421> who were of the children<WH1121> of Dan,<WH1835> stood<WH5324> by the entrance<WH6607> of the gate.<WH8179>

The five<WH2568> men<WH582> who went<WH1980> to spy out<WH7270> the land<WH776> went up,<WH5927> and came in<WH935> there,<WH3947> and took the engraved image,<WH6459> and the ephod,<WH646> and the teraphim,<WH8655> and the molten image:<WH4541> and the priest<WH3548> stood<WH5324> by the entrance<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> with the six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> girt<WH2296> with weapons<WH3627> of war.<WH4421>

When these went<WH935> into Micah<WH4318>'s house,<WH1004> and fetched<WH3947> the engraved image,<WH6459> the ephod,<WH646> and the teraphim,<WH8655> and the molten image,<WH4541> the priest<WH3548> said<WH559> to them,<WH6213> "What are you doing?"

They said<WH559> to him,<WH2790> "Hold your peace, put your hand<WH3027> on your mouth,<WH6310> and go<WH3212> with us,<WH1961> and be to us<WH1961> a father<WH1> and a priest.<WH3548> Is it better<WH2896> for you to be priest<WH3548> to the house<WH1004> of one<WH259> man,<WH376> or to be priest<WH3548> to a tribe<WH7626> and a family<WH4940> in Israel?<WH3478>"

The priest<WH3548>'s heart<WH3820> was glad,<WH3190> and he took<WH3947> the ephod,<WH646> and the teraphim,<WH8655> and the engraved image,<WH6459> and went in<WH935> the midst<WH7130> of the people.<WH5971>
So they turned<WH6437> and departed,<WH3212> and put<WH7760> the little ones<WH2945> and the livestock<WH4735> and the goods<WH3520> before them.<WH6440>

When they were a good way<WH7368> from the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> the men<WH582> who were in the houses<WH1004> near to Micah<WH4318>'s house<WH1004> were gathered together,<WH2199> and overtook<WH1692> the children<WH1121> of Dan.<WH1835>
They cried<WH7121> to the children<WH1121> of Dan.<WH1835> They turned<WH5437> their faces,<WH6440> and said<WH559> to Micah,<WH4318> "What ails you,<WH2199> that you come with such a company?"

He said,<WH559> "You have taken away<WH3947> my gods<WH430> which I made,<WH6213> and the priest,<WH3548> and have gone away,<WH3212> and what more do I have?<WH559> How then do you say to me, 'What ails you?'"

The children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> said<WH559> to him,<WH6963> "Don't let your voice be heard<WH8085> among us,<WH4751> lest angry fellows<WH582> fall<WH6293> on you,<WH622> and you lose your life,<WH5315> with the lives<WH5315> of your household.<WH1004>"

The children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> went<WH3212> their way:<WH1870> and when Micah<WH4318> saw<WH7200> that they were too strong<WH2389> for him,<WH6437> he turned and went back<WH7725> to his house.<WH1004>

They took<WH3947> that which Micah<WH4318> had made,<WH6213> and the priest<WH3548> whom he had,<WH935> and came to Laish,<WH3919> to a people<WH5971> quiet<WH8252> and secure,<WH982> and struck<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword;<WH2719> and they burnt<WH8313> the city<WH5892> with fire.<WH784>

There was no deliverer,<WH5337> because it was far<WH7350> from Sidon,<WH6721> and they had no dealings<WH1697> with any man;<WH120> and it was in the valley<WH6010> that lies by Beth Rehob.<WH1050> They built<WH1129> the city,<WH5892> and lived therein.<WH3427>

They called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> Dan,<WH1835> after the name<WH8034> of Dan<WH1835> their father,<WH1> who was born<WH3205> to Israel:<WH3478> however<WH199> the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> was Laish<WH3919> at the first.<WH7223>

The children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> set up<WH6965> for themselves the engraved image:<WH6459> and Jonathan,<WH3083> the son<WH1121> of Gershom,<WH1647> the son<WH1121> of Moses,<WH4519> he and his sons<WH1121> were priests<WH3548> to the tribe<WH7626> of the Danites<WH1839> until the day<WH3117> of the captivity<WH1540> of the land.<WH776>
So they set them up<WH7760> Micah<WH4318>'s engraved image<WH6459> which he made,<WH6213> all the time<WH3117> that the house<WH1004> of God<WH430> was in Shiloh.<WH7887>
